item.title: Writing a simple Firefox Extension
item.description: Every now and then, I want to build something that I would use. Coming from a web developer background, I’m under the impression that I have to build a web application. One day I have this “a ha” moment: Actually most of the time, I can just build a web extension instead of a web application for my needs!
